predicate.note: Frames file for 'volunteer' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to give or offer to give voluntarily

example.name: transitive
example.text: We will not know until a first generation of female guinea pigs -- all of whom [*T*-1] will be more than happy [*-2] to volunteer for the job -- has put the abortion pill through the clinical test of time .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Sen. Alan Cranston trekked over to the House side of Capitol Hill a few days ago and volunteered his testimony to fellow Democrat Rep. Henry Gonzalez .
